item.description:
The Law of Attraction, the basis by which the entire Universe operates, affects physical as well as non-physical experiences. In essence, thought draws in other thoughts of a similar vibration, and the same applies to what surrounds you from the moment you wake up until you say good night.

Feng Shui is the art & science that concerns itself with what & how we interact with our environments...
- to understand what we have attracted and
- make the necessary adjustments
so that we can harmoniously vibrate with what we allow in our world and thus claim the life that we want.

Did you know that LOA is the core of six millennium of Feng Shui practice?

so... Can Understanding and Changing Our Environments Attract Better Relationships?

JOIN US at our February meetup when we celebrate LoVE in ALL relationships, and hear Lidia Scher, Feng Shui expert and BostonLOA member introduce us to the ancient Feng Shui principles, to help us analyze & revamp key areas of our homes...
- to provide clarity,
- align our thoughts with our desires &
- allow the right relationships to enter & flourish in our lives.

Prepare to allow meeting up with the special someone, &/or enhance your current relationships with yourself, your significant other, your family & your friends.

Thank you very much, Lidia, for your gift of time, expertise and facilitation at our February meetup!

About Lidia Scher

Award-winning interior designer, sculptor and Feng Shui expert, Lidia Scher is a native of Argentina, who has earned a bachelor of fine arts degree in sculpture and architectural design, and holds a Master of Art degree from the Mass College of Art.

In addition she has studied professional level training in Feng Shui with Stephen Devine and Grandmaster Professor Lin Yun, and holds a certificate of Advanced Feng Shui Studies from Shanghai, China.

Lidia is the recipient of numerous sculpture and interior design awards, is a much sought after speaker with teaching credentials from DeCordova Museum, the University of Lowell, and Newbury College, and has authored several articles on Feng Shui, art education and interior design.

Lidia is the owner of LAS Associates, a 21 year old Arlington, MA based interior and architectural design practice specializing in dental/ medical design. www.lasassociates.net

She is on sabbatical as the Program Director for the Boston School of Feng Shui.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Law of Attraction February Meetup
